    • Uses of IndependentProbDistribution in opendial

      Methods in opendial that return IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentProbDistribution DialogueSystem.getContent(java.lang.String variable)
      Returns the probability distribution associated with the variables in the current dialogue state.
      Methods in opendial with parameters of type IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> DialogueSystem.addContent(IndependentProbDistribution distrib)
      Adds the content (expressed as a categorical table over variables) to the current dialogue state, and subsequently updates the dialogue state.

    • Uses of IndependentProbDistribution in opendial.bn.distribs

      Classes in opendial.bn.distribs with type parameters of type IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConditionalDistribution<T extends IndependentProbDistribution>
      Conditional probability distribution represented as a probability table.
      Classes in opendial.bn.distribs that implement IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CategoricalTable
      Representation of a categorical probability table P(X), where X is a random variable.
      class  ContinuousDistribution
      Representation of a continuous probability distribution, defined by an arbitrary density function over a single (univariate or multivariate) variable.
      Methods in opendial.bn.distribs that return IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentProbDistribution IndependentProbDistribution.copy()
      Returns a copy of the distribution.
      IndependentProbDistribution EmpiricalDistribution.getMarginal(java.lang.String var)
      Returns an independent probability distribution on a single random variable based on the samples.
      IndependentProbDistribution MultivariateDistribution.getMarginal(java.lang.String variable)
      Returns the marginal probability distribution P(Xi) for a random variable Xi in X1,...Xn.
      default IndependentProbDistribution IndependentProbDistribution.getPosterior(Assignment condition)
      Returns itself.
      default IndependentProbDistribution IndependentProbDistribution.getProbDistrib(Assignment condition)
      Returns itself.
      IndependentProbDistribution ProbDistribution.getProbDistrib(Assignment condition)
      Returns the (unconditional) probability distribution associated with the conditional assignment provided as argument.

    • Uses of IndependentProbDistribution in opendial.inference

      Methods in opendial.inference that return IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default IndependentProbDistribution InferenceAlgorithm.queryProb(BNetwork network, java.lang.String queryVar)
      Computes the probability distribution for the query variable, assuming no additional evidence.
      default IndependentProbDistribution InferenceAlgorithm.queryProb(BNetwork network, java.lang.String queryVar, Assignment evidence)
      Computes the probability distribution for the query variable given the provided evidence.
